otherObtainDestroyer: Special Gameplay: Other characters start with Destroyer and a special card; All enemies start combat with +1 Strength.
otherObtainDestroyer2: All characters start with Destroyer.(See config for details.)
activeTutorials: Load Tutorials.(Tutorials automatically close after loading once)
dontLoad3d: Disable 3D model (can be enabled when crashing occurs)
difficultMod: Hard Mode: Elephs are only dropped in elite battles and boss battles.
imgSelectSfx: Play the sound effect when selecting Eleph.
debugForceSampleEvent: Debug: Force ? events to the sample event (quick verification)
llmEventEnabled: Enable LLM-generated events (requires an LLM service)
debugForceLLMEvent: Debug: Force ? events to LLM event (quick verification)
